summary: Two college students volunteer for pharmaceutical testing to make some extra cash.
cast: Travis Van Winkle|John Bregar|Tricia Helfer|James Purcell|Yanna McIntosh|Sterling Jarvis|Rik Young|Mircea Monroe|Amara Zaragoza|Vas Saranga|Albert Chung|Ardon Bess|Anna Ferguson|Stephen Bogaert|Joe Pingue|Eric Roberts
title: Bloodwork
